definition[0]: morally good or generous in a way that is admired
example[0]: It’s very noble of you to spend all your weekends helping the old folk.
example[2]: a member of an ancient noble family
example[3]: The Marquis would have to marry a woman of noble blood.
definition[2]: something that is noble is very impressive and beautiful
example[4]: the old church with its noble tower
definition[3]: a member of the highest social class with a title such as ‘Duke’ or ‘Countess’
